title: Programming in R
text:
pre_treat <- c(120, 151, 125, 126, 115, 132, 132, 129, 134, 139, 127, 122, 127, 135, 133, 128, 147, 138, 140, 132)
names(pre_treat) <- paste("Subject", 1:20, sep = "_")


post_treat <- c(127, 145, 135, 122, 115, 122, 123, 126, 126, 129, 132, 146, 120, 114, 121, 120, 128, 120, 133, 115)
names(post_treat) <- paste("Subject", 1:20, sep = "_")

change_BP <- post_treat - pre_treat

mean(change_BP)

[1] -5.65

which(change_BP <0)

 Subject_2  Subject_4  Subject_6  Subject_7  Subject_8  Subject_9 Subject_10 
         2          4          6          7          8          9         10 
Subject_13 Subject_14 Subject_15 Subject_16 Subject_17 Subject_18 Subject_19 
        13         14         15         16         17         18         19 
Subject_20 
        20 

pos_change_BP <- (change_BP[change_BP < 0])

mean(pos_change_BP)

[1] -10.6

title: Programming in R
text:
Task 2:

bp_df <- data.frame(c(1:20), pre_treat, post_treat, change_BP)
names(bp_df) = c("patient", "pre_bp", "post_bp", "diff_bp")
bp_df <- bp_df[bp_df$diff_bp < 0,]
bp_df$post120 <- (bp_df$post_bp < 120)

knitr::kable(bp_df)

title: Programming in R
text:
Task 3

new_pre_treat <- c(138, 135, 147, 117, 152, 134, 114, 121, 131, 130)
names(new_pre_treat) <- paste("Subject", 1:10, sep = "_")

new_post_treat <- c(105, 136, 123, 130, 134, 143, 135, 139, 120, 124)
names(new_post_treat) <- paste("Subject", 1:10, sep = "_")

new_change_BP <- new_post_treat - new_pre_treat

new_bp_df <- data.frame(c(1:10), new_pre_treat, new_post_treat, new_change_BP)
names(new_bp_df) = c("patient", "pre_bp", "post_bp", "diff_bp")
new_bp_df <- new_bp_df[new_bp_df$diff_bp < 0,]
new_bp_df$post120 <- (new_bp_df$post_bp < 120)

knitr::kable(new_bp_df)





patient
pre_bp
post_bp
diff_bp
post120
